## dce admin accounts remove

Remove a DCE account(s) from the accounts pull. Reduces the total number of accounts.

### Synopsis

Remove a DCE account(s) from the accounts pull. Reduces the total number of accounts.

```
dce admin accounts remove [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for remove
```
